Time is a precious asset, and with Produce8, you can recover over 90 minutes a day that might be lost to distractions, unnecessary collaboration, and constant task switching.

The Produce8 Chrome Extension is designed to assist individuals, teams, and leaders gain insights into their work habits and provide visibility into their workday.

After setting up your Produce8 account (available with both free and paid plans), use the Produce8 for Chrome extension to:

See Your Workday: Get detailed analytics that shed light on your work habits, helping you make data-driven decisions for enhanced productivity and wellbeing. 

Measure Impact: See results of workflow adjustments and changes in your team's work patterns. Track progress and measure success effortlessly with daily reports, real-time work timelines, and detailed metrics. 

Foster Collaboration: Get your team together to face problems head-on. Talk about issues like too much collaboration, constantly switching tasks, and feeling burnt out. This way, everyone can figure out what's helping them succeed and what's getting in their way. 

Works with All Your Tools: Slack, Email, Zoom, Notion, and more. Produce8 brings activity from any browser and web-based app in one place. Start quickly with our App Catalog and add more tools from there. 

About Produce8: 
We help teams understand how they leverage their technology and time to improve performance and protect employee wellbeing. 

Got questions? Visit https://kb.produce8.com/knowledge/how-to-install-the-produce8-browser-extension
